item.description:
Details: The Mighty Mighty Bosstones, The Amazing Royal Crowns, Big D & the Kids Table, The Convictions

Tickets are availabe through www.livenation.com, www.boxofficeticketsales, or www.ticketmaster.com. Tickets are around $35 GA to $60 for first level at House of Blues. I plan to get tickets for GA and will be located at the bar in the GA area around 7:30pm.

I will send out my mobile number for those attending the day of the concert.
item.name: RadioBDC Presents The Mighty Mighty Bosstones Hometown Throwdown 15
